title: PESIT or UVCE?
content: Guys,so I'm from the Northeast India,I studied in the 1st PU of PES PU in the integrated batch, I'm switching to another PU college rn due to shifting another in place,my state has a seat in UVCE,but should I try for the PESSAT?are there even any Northeastern students in PES?

comments.body: UVCE ofc because the fees is like 5 times lesser and the placements are good too.
I know multiple people who study there, they all recommend it
PES for CSE is far superior. There are definitely some Northeastern students in PES.
Are you talking about PES Mandya cause ik them
